Verses: 1 yosabaath Than Pidhaakkalode Niththiraiyadaindhu, Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Than Pidhaakkalandaiyile Adakkampannappattaan; Avan Sthaanaththile Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yoraam Raajaavaanaan.
2 avanukku Yosabaaththin Kumaararaagiya Asariyaa, Egiyel, Sagariyaa, Asariyaa, Migaavel, Seppaththiyaa Ennum Sagodharar Irundhaargal; Ivargal Ellaarum Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaaththin Kumaarar.

3 avargaludaiya Thagappan Velliyum, Ponnum Uchchidhangalumaana Anegam Nankodaigalaiyum, Yoodhaavile Aranaana Pattanangalaiyum Avargalukkuk Koduththaan; Yoraam Seshtapuththiranaanapadiyaal, Avanukku Raajyaththaik Koduththaan.
4 yoraam Than Thagappanudaiya Raajyabaaraththirku Vandhu Thannai Balappaduththikkondapinbu, Avan Thannudaiya Sagodharar Ellaaraiyum Isravelin Prabukkalil Silaraiyum Pattayaththaal Kondrupottaan.
5 yoraam Raajaavaagirapodhu, Muppaththirandu Vayadhaayirundhu, Ettu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandaan.
6 avan Isravel Raajaakkalin Vazhiyile Nadandhu, Aagaabin Veettaar Seydhadhupola Seydhaan; Aagaabin Kumaaraththi Avanukku Manaiviyaayirundhaal; Avankarththarin Paarvaikkup Pollaappaanadhai Seydhaan.

7 karththar Dhaaveedhukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Endrendraikkum Oru Vilakkaik Kattalaiyiduven Endru Solli, Avanode Pannina Udanpadikkaiyinimiththam Dhaaveedhin Vamsaththai Azhikka Siththamillaadhirundhaar.
8 avan Naatkalil Yoodhaavudaiya Kaiyin Keezhirundha Edhomiyar Kalagampanni, Thangalukku Oru Raajaavai Erpaduththikkondaargal.

9 adhinaal Yoraam Than Prabukkalodum Than Sagala Radhangalodum Purappattupponaan; Avan Raaththiriyil Ezhundhirundhu, Thannai Valaindhukonda Edhomiyaraiyum Radhangalin Thalaivaraiyum Muriya Adiththaan.

10 aagilum Yoodhaavudaiya Kaiyin Keezhirundha Edhomiyar Innaalvaraikkum Irukkiradhupola, Kalagampannip Pirindhaargal; Avan Than Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiyakarththarai Vittapadiyinaal, Akkaalaththile Lipnaa Pattanaththaarum Kalagampanninaargal.
11 avan Yoodhaavudaiya Malaigalinmel Medaigalai Undaakki, Erusalemin Kudigalai Sorampogappanni, Yoodhaavaiyum Adharku Evivittaan.

12 appozhudhu Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Eliyaa Ezhudhina Oru Nirubam Avanidaththirku Vandhadhu; Adhil: Ummudaiya Thagappanaana Dhaaveedhin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Nee Un Thagappanaagiya Yosabaaththin Vazhigalilum, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Aasaavin Vazhigalilum Nadavaamal,

13 isravel Raajaakkalin Vazhiyile Nadandhu, Aagaabudaiya Kudumbaththin Soramaarkkaththirku Oththapadiye Yoodhaavaiyum Erusalemin Kudigalaiyum Sorampogappanni, Unnaippaarkkilum Nallavargalaayirundha Un Thagappan Veettaaraana Un Sagodhararaiyum Kondrupottapadiyinaal,
14 idho, Karththar Un Janaththaiyum, Un Pillaigalaiyum, Un Manaivigalaiyum, Unakku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Magaa Vaadhaiyaaga Vaadhippaar.
15 neeyo Unakku Undaagum Kudalnoyinaal Un Kudalgal Naalukku Naal Itru Vizhumattum Kodiya Vyaadhiyinaal Vaadhikkappaduvaai Endru Ezhudhiyirundhadhu.
16 appadiye Karththar Pelistharin Aaviyaiyum, Eththiyoppiyaavukkaduththa Dhesaththaaraana Arabiyarin Aaviyaiyum Yoraamukku Virodhamaaga Ezhuppinaar.

17 avargal Yoodhaavil Vandhu, Balaathkaaramaaip Pugundhu, Raajaavin Aramanaiyil Agappatta Ellaap Porulgalaiyum, Avan Pillaigalaiyum, Avan Manaivigalaiyum Pidiththukkonduponaargal; Yovaagaas Ennum Avan Kumaararil Ilaiyavanai Allaamal Oru Kumaaranum Avanukku Meedhiyaaga Vaikkappadavillai.
18 ivaigal Ellaavatrirkum Pirpaadu Karththar Avan Kudalgalil Undaana Theeraadha Noyinaal Avanai Vaadhiththaar.

19 appadi Naalukkunaal Irundhu, Irandu Varusham Mudigirakaalaththil Avanukku Undaana Noyinaal Avan Kudalgal Sarindhu Kodiya Vyaadhiyinaal Seththupponaan; Avanudaiya Pidhaakkalukkaagak Kandhavarkkangalaik Koluththinadhupol, Avanudaiya Janangal Avanukkaagak Koluththavillai.

20 avan Raajaavaagirapodhu Muppaththirandu Vayadhaayirundhu, Ettu Varusham Erusalemil Arasaandu, Virumbuvaarillaamal Irandhuponaan; Avanai Dhaaveedhin Nagaraththil Adakkampanninaargal; Aanaalum Raajaakkalin Kallaraigalil Avanai Vaikkavillai.
